column4: I really like Yast in SuSE...its great, and zypper works awesomely fast in 10.3RC1
but ubuntu is a far superior product for a notbook or non power user
you know whats weird...when I had SuSE 10.2 on this laptop, compiz ran horribly slow...I thought my card sucked or something...but w/ ubuntu all the eyecandy stuff is way smoother
